T02D1852:120a-1: shr'i gu hya sa m'a dza tantra r'a dz'a t'i ka tsandra pra bh'a n'a ma /
T02D1852:120a-3: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po'i bshad pa zla ba'i 'od zer zhes bya ba /
T02D1852:120a-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1852:120a-6: shes rab thabs dang pas ni bdag gzhan phan pa phun sum tshogs chen mnga' ba chos kyi sku //
T02D1852:120a-7: rgyal ba mchog gi tshogs dang de yi sras rnams bcas par rig pa 'byung ba dang po yi //
T02D1852:120a-8: dpal ldan chos 'byung zhes byar bzhugs shing rgyal ba'i rigs tshogs lhan cig sems can don mthar phyin //

T02D1852:120a-16: dpal ldan gsang ba 'dus pa yi //
T02D1852:120a-17: bshad pa 'di ni bdag gis bya //
T02D1852:120a-18: 'di'i rjod par byed pa ni gang //
T02D1852:120a-19: brjod par bya ba ni gang /

T02D1852:120b-3: bya ba de lta bu'i rnam par dpyad pa med

T02D1852:120b-9: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bha gar lha thams cad tshogs pa'o //

T02D1852:120b-15: dang lhan cig kun du gnas pa'i phyir ma skyes

T02D1852:120b-19: / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
T02D1852:120b-20: don de ston par byed pa'i sgra'i tshogs ni rgyud yin no //
T02D1852:120b-21: rgyud dang brjod par bya ba dag ni rjod par
T02D1852:120b-22: byed pa dang brjod par bya ba'i mtshan nyid kyi
T02D1852:120b-24: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la sogs pa'i sgo
T02D1852:120b-25: nas gdul bya'i skye bo'i don bya ba ni dgos

T02D1852:120b-27: pa'i gdol pa la sogs pa rnams kyang yin te
T02D1852:120b-28: pa'o // / mchog gi yang mchog gi rgyud ni
T02D1852:120b-29: rnam pa thams cad du dag pa nyid yin pa'i
T02D1852:120b-30: pa'o // / phyir / bcom ldan 'das kyis ma
T02D1852:120b-31: dag pa cung zad kyang med do zhes gsungs so
T02D1852:120b-32: pa'o // / phyir / // de'i dgos pa ni

T02D1852:120b-36: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin
T02D1852:120b-37: gyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa'i le'u dang po'i
T02D1852:120b-38: sgo nas rdo rje 'chang chen po'i yan lag gi

T02D1852:120b-45: pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa rnams kyis

T02D1852:121a-25: dang mnyam pa'i gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi
T02D1852:121a-26: rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
T02D1852:121a-27: do // smad pa dang / // / par zhugs
T02D1852:121a-28: nas / ji lta ba bzhin du dbang bskur te

T02D1852:121a-45: zhes bya ba la sogs pas rang gi rtog pa brjod do //

T02D1852:121b-5: kyi thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u bzhi pa gsungs
T02D1852:121b-6: so // 'di rnams kyi dbang bskur dang dam tshig dang sdom pa yang snga ma bzhin no //
T02D1852:121b-7: de ltar dam tshig dang sdom pa thob pa rnams
T02D1852:121b-8: la rdo rje 'chang chen po la sogs pa rnams
T02D1852:121b-9: bsgrub pa'i man ngag sbyin par bya'o //

T02D1852:121b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sbyor

T02D1852:121b-13: bcu gnyis pa las gsungs pa'i dgon pa chen po
T02D1852:121b-15: dam tshig gi le'u brgyad pa las gsungs pa ni /

T02D1852:121b-40: bcu gsum pa las gsungs pa'i bsam gtan las byung

T02D1852:122a-1: par 'gyur ba'i tshul gyis bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i phur
T02D1852:122a-2: bu rnams kyis gnod mdzes la bka' bsgos te gdab
T02D1852:122a-3: par bya zhing bka' bsgos te /
T02D1852:122a-4: phyogs kyi phyi rol yang bcing bar bya'o //
T02D1852:122a-5: phyogs dang phyi rol bcing ba la sogs pa'i cho

T02D1852:122a-7: du rdo rje 'chang chen por mos pa dang ldan
T02D1852:122a-8: pas sgrub thabs kyi rim pa bzhin du byang chub
T02D1852:122a-9: kyi sems kyi le'u gnyis pa las gsungs pa'i dngos

T02D1852:122a-14: brlabs nas rang gi sngags brjod de zla ba la

T02D1852:122a-16: ldan pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par gyur

T02D1852:122a-19: sngon du 'gro ba can gyi shes rab kyi chos

T02D1852:122a-28: le'u brgyad pa las gsungs pa'i //

T02D1852:122a-46: bsdu ba dag kyang rab tu bya //

T02D1852:122b-4: rin chen sna bzhi'i mchod rten ni //
T02D1852:122b-5: zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid
T02D1852:122b-6: can rgyar dpag tshad bye ba yod pa shin tu

T02D1852:122b-9: gsal ba la sogs dkyil 'khor ldan //

T02D1852:122b-14: sngon la gnas rdzogs par byas te /

T02D1852:122b-19: lha'i 'khor lo'i dbus na gnas pa'i rdo rje 'chang

T02D1852:123a-28: la spyod pa'i sems can rnams rab tu dga' bar

T02D1852:123a-31: bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su mnyes par bya ba'i

T02D1852:123a-33: nas / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod

T02D1852:123a-35: par sprul te byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams

T02D1852:123a-38: 'dod pa thams cad la nye bar longs spyod pa'i
T02D1852:123a-39: dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas

T02D1852:123b-0: dus su le'u bco lnga pa las @123b gsungs pa'i

T02D1852:123b-3: bzhin du rang gi snying ga nas phyung ste nu

T02D1852:123b-12: yi ge h'um dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas
T02D1852:123b-13: rang gi rdo rje dang padma mngon par 'dus byas

T02D1852:123b-17: bdun pa las gsung pa zla ba'i 'od zer zhes
T02D1852:123b-18: bya ba la sogs pas rang gi rig ma bsil
T02D1852:123b-19: ba'i 'od zer lnga dang ldan par bsams nas /

T02D1852:123b-22: ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis rdo rje gnyi ga

T02D1852:123b-25: drug pa las gsungs pa'i rjes su chags pa'i sngags
T02D1852:123b-26: brjod la / rim pa de nyid kyis le'u bdun
T02D1852:123b-27: pa las gsungs pa'i rjes su dran pa'i tshul gyis
T02D1852:123b-28: rdo rje g-yo ba padmar bcug ste /

T02D1852:123b-30: dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin las gsungs pa kho na
T02D1852:123b-32: yi ge h'um gi glu len cing las la gnas par bya ste /

T02D1852:124a-1: pa'i dam tshig rjes su dran pa bsgom pa las gsungs pa /

T02D1852:124a-18: gyi dang po sbyor ba ting nge 'dzin dang po

T02D1852:124a-21: rjes su dran pa bsgom pa gsungs te /
T02D1852:124a-22: le'u dang po las gsungs pa'i ye shes sgron ma

T02D1852:124a-36: kyi 'khor lo gzhug par bya'o zhes bya ba ni
T02D1852:124a-37: dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge
T02D1852:124a-39: las rgyal po'i mchog ni mi bskyod pa la sogs

T02D1852:124a-41: zhe sdang la sogs pa la mngon par dga' ba'i

T02D1852:124b-0: sku gsung thugs rmad du byung ba'i sngags @124b kyis
T02D1852:124b-1: 'gugs pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyal po'i le'u bcu

T02D1852:124b-5: can gyi ting nge 'dzin gsum pa yin par bstan
T02D1852:124b-6: / to // de nas le'u gsum pa las gsungs pa'i ;
T02D1852:124b-7: rin chen kha dog sna lnga pa //

T02D1852:124b-10: sems ni thig ler gyur pa gzhag //

T02D1852:124b-14: dbang bskur ba dang rjes su gnang ba thob pa /

T02D1852:124b-16: bya ba ma lus pa bsgrub pa lhur len pas

T02D1852:124b-18: le'u bcu pa las gsungs pa'i nga rgyal dang ldan pa'i sbyor bas bsgrub par bya ste /

T02D1852:124b-35: / // de ltar sgrub pa'i thabs kyi bsdus pa'i

T02D1852:124b-37: / // / le'u bcu'i don bshad pa nyid yin no /

T02D1852:124b-40: zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pas sngon du spyod

T02D1852:125a-0: pas ni rang gi lha bsgom @125a * //

T02D1852:125a-6: zhes bya ba la sogs pas mi snang ba bsgom ste /
T02D1852:125a-7: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
T02D1852:125a-8: zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
T02D1852:125a-9: sku gsum mi phyed sgrub par 'gyur //

T02D1852:125a-11: bzhin du 'phags pa 'jam dpal dang sa'i snying po

T02D1852:125a-18: mi bskyod ye shes zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T02D1852:125a-19: lha gang yang rung ba'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas /
T02D1852:125a-20: mig la sogs pa rnams la sa'i snying po la

T02D1852:125a-25: pas ni sems brtan par bya ba'i bsgom pa'i man

T02D1852:125a-27: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bskal bar gnas pa'i man ngag gsungs so //

T02D1852:125a-29: mam zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni 'phags pa

T02D1852:125a-31: // rdo rje mi phyed ces bya ba la sogs pas ni rdzas kyi ri lu bsgrub pa'o //
T02D1852:125a-32: rdo rje chen po rab sngags kyis //

T02D1852:125a-34: 'od zer lnga'i zhes bya ba la sogs pas rdo rje gsum gyi rig 'dzin pa nyid do //

T02D1852:125b-28: rdo rje rnam pa bzhi yi las //

T02D1852:125b-30: ma dad smra ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
T02D1852:125b-31: bka' yi 'khor lo sbyar bar bya //

T02D1852:132b-6: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1852:132b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung
T02D1852:132b-8: dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag po ni rdo rje 'chang
T02D1852:132b-9: chen po ste / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D1852:132b-10: kyi dkyil 'khor chen po bshad ma thag pa'i dbus
T02D1852:132b-11: su bdag nyid bzhugs par gyur ro //
T02D1852:132b-12: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dang
T02D1852:132b-13: po sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsgoms pa'i rjes thogs
T02D1852:132b-14: la rten gyi dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i phyir /
T02D1852:132b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams shin tu phra ba'i dam
T02D1852:132b-16: tshig gi dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin du rten gyi
T02D1852:132b-17: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus nas gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs
T02D1852:132b-18: pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'i thugs la ste
T02D1852:132b-19: / shes rab ye shes kyi rang bzhin bde ba
T02D1852:132b-20: chen po'i gnas chos 'byung zhes bya ba la bzhugs
T02D1852:132b-21: / par gyur te / de skad du yang /
T02D1852:132b-22: thugs ni ye shes zhes byar brjod //
T02D1852:132b-24: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems rdo rje zhes bya ba la /
T02D1852:132b-25: byang chub ni shes rab ste /
T02D1852:132b-26: de dang ldan pa'i sems rdo rje ni byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'o //
T02D1852:132b-27: yang na ba ni rdo rje'o //
T02D1852:132b-30: ta ni mchog tu dga' ba ste /
T02D1852:132b-33: ba ni rdo rje zhes byar bshad //
T02D1852:132b-34: yi ge dhi ni 'dzin pa'i gnas //
T02D1852:132b-35: tsa ni 'dzag par rab tu brjod //
T02D1852:132b-36: ta ni bde ba chen po'o //
T02D1852:132b-38: de nyid ni shes rab gtso bor gyur pa nyid yin pa'i phyir rdo rje ste /
T02D1852:132b-39: nges 'byed shes rab rdo rje yin //
T02D1852:132b-41: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1852:132b-42: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni dkyil 'khor ba rnams dang /
T02D1852:132b-43: til gyi gang bu dang mtshungs pa rnams so //
T02D1852:132b-44: de dag ting nge 'dzin gang gis de rnams zil gyis gnon pa ste /
T02D1852:133a-1: bzhin gyi chos kyi sku la dmigs pa'i sgo nas
T02D1852:133a-2: snang ba med par byed pa de la de skad
T02D1852:133a-3: ces bya'o // de nyid rnam par dag pa'i blo yin pa'i phyir rdo rje ste /
T02D1852:133a-4: sdom pa'i rgyud phyi ma las kyang /
T02D1852:133a-5: zla ba lta bur dag pa'i blo //
T02D1852:133a-6: rdo rje zhes pa ni mngon par brjod //
T02D1852:133a-8: ting nge 'dzin gang la ming de skad ces bya ba yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1852:133a-9: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i nam
T02D1852:133a-10: mkha'i dbyings 'di thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D1852:133a-11: cad kyi rdo rje'i ngo bor zhes bya ba la
T02D1852:133a-12: / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje
T02D1852:133a-13: ni don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems yin zhing
T02D1852:133a-14: / / de'i ngo bo ste rang bzhin du gyur
T02D1852:133a-15: cing gnas par gyur to zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D1852:133a-16: / / // de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1852:133a-17: rdo rje sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis zhes bya
T02D1852:133a-18: ba ni bde ba chen po las byung ba'i rdo
T02D1852:133a-19: rje dpal dang reg pas so //
T02D1852:133a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba ni mchog tu dga' ba'o //
T02D1852:133a-21: yid bde ba ni de las byung ba'i mtha' yas
T02D1852:133a-22: pa'i sprul pas sems can gyi don byed pa ste
T02D1852:133a-23: / sems can gang dag gis de dag thob cing rnyed pa de rnams de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1852:133a-24: sems can thams cad kyis rdo rje 'chang la sogs
T02D1852:133a-25: pa'i go 'phang thob pa'i thabs ston par byed pa'i
T02D1852:133a-26: rnal 'byor gsum ston pa'i dam tshig 'byung ba rdo
T02D1852:133a-27: rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni
T02D1852:133a-28: / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsungs te /
T02D1852:133a-29: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ni yi ge gsum ste /
T02D1852:133a-30: sku rdo rje la sogs pa skyed par byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1852:133a-31: dam tshig ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
T02D1852:133a-32: 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa'i rdo rje 'chang
T02D1852:133a-33: chen po ste / ting nge 'dzin gang la de
T02D1852:133a-34: 'byung zhing skye ba rdo rje ltar mi shigs pa
T02D1852:133a-35: yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1852:133a-36: de ni rig pa yang yin la chen po yang
T02D1852:133a-37: yin pas rig pa chen po ni sngags kyi yi
T02D1852:133a-38: ge rnams kho na yin te /
T02D1852:133a-39: sngags ni rig pa zhes su bsgrags //
T02D1852:133a-41: de rnams kyis bskyed pa'i mgo dang lag pa la
T02D1852:133a-42: sogs pa dang ldan pa'i skyes bu'i rnam pa'i lha'i
T02D1852:133a-43: sku ni rig pa chen po'i skyes bu'i gzugs so
T02D1852:133b-0: // yang na rig pa dang 'khyud pa nyid yin @133b ba'i phyir te /
T02D1852:133b-2: skyes bu rig pa dang ldan pa //
T02D1852:133b-3: de ni rig pa'i skyes bur brjod //
T02D1852:133b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la //
T02D1852:133b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags ni yi ge h'um la sogs pa rnams te /
T02D1852:133b-7: de rnams kyis byin gyis brlab pa ni rnal 'byor
T02D1852:133b-8: rdzogs pa'i rjes su rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor chen
T02D1852:133b-9: po'i rang bzhin yin zhing de dag gis byin gyis
T02D1852:133b-11: byin gyis brlabs pas ji lta bu'i rnam par gyur ce na /
T02D1852:133b-12: zhal gsum pa lta bur 'jig rten gyi khams thams
T02D1852:133b-13: cad na bzhugs pa rnams kyis gzigs par gyur to
T02D1852:133b-14: zhes gsungs so // des ni 'di skad du bstan pa yin te /
T02D1852:133b-15: dgon pa chen po la sogs pa'i gnas mngon par
T02D1852:133b-16: 'dus byas par bdud rtsi lngas byugs pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1852:133b-17: grub bzhi'i steng du stan 'jam po la nye bar
T02D1852:133b-18: 'dug ste / sems can ma lus sdud par byed pa'i snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed nas /
T02D1852:133b-19: skad cig gis chos 'byung gi nang na gnas pa'i
T02D1852:133b-20: gzhal yas khang gi nang du lha thams cad kyi
T02D1852:133b-21: 'khor lo'i dbus na gnas pa'i rdo rje 'chang chen
T02D1852:133b-22: po'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas 'chad par 'gyur ba'i
T02D1852:133b-23: mi bskyod pa dbyung ba dang /
T02D1852:133b-24: gzhug pa'i sgo nas zhe sdang rdo rjer gyur par bya'o //
T02D1852:133b-25: de nas m'a ma k'i'i padma la gnas pa'i zla
T02D1852:133b-26: ba yi ge h'um gyur pa las yi ge gsum
T02D1852:133b-27: gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnod mdzes rgyal po bskyed
T02D1852:133b-28: de phyung nas / mdun na gnas pa'i nyi ma'i
T02D1852:133b-29: dkyil 'khor la 'jig pa'i dus kyi sprin ltar drag
T02D1852:133b-30: cing sngo la bskal ba'i me ltar 'bar ba /
T02D1852:133b-31: pus mo bskum pa'i rkang pa g-yas pas au ma'i nu ma rgyas pa mnan cing /
T02D1852:133b-32: g-yon pa brkyang bas mtho lngas par chod par drag
T02D1852:133b-33: po'i rna ba g-yon pa'i steng du mnan te gnas
T02D1852:133b-34: pa / zhal dbus ma sngo zhing khro gnyer dang bcas la spyan dmar zhing mche ba gtsigs pa /
T02D1852:133b-35: zhal g-yas dang g-yon ni dkar zhing zhi ba dang dmar zhing sgeg pa /
T02D1852:133b-36: rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa /
T02D1852:133b-37: ral ba'i cod pan la gnas pa'i mi bskyod pa'i dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa /
T02D1852:133b-38: rtsa ba'i phyag dag gis rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi
T02D1852:133b-39: phyag rgyas rig ma la 'khyud cing rdo rje dang
T02D1852:134a-2: g-yon pa dag gis dgra sta dang zhags pa bsnams pa rnam par bsams nas /
T02D1852:134a-3: de la bka' bsgo bar bya ste /
T02D1852:134a-4: aom sum bha ni sum bha h'um /
T02D1852:134a-6: gihn'a pa ya grihn'a pa ya h'um /
T02D1852:134a-7: aom a'a na ya ho bha ga w'an bidy'a r'a dza h'um phat /
T02D1852:134a-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das gnod mdzes rgyal pos zhags
T02D1852:134a-9: pa dang lcags kyu rnams phyogs bcu ru skyur nas
T02D1852:134a-10: / de rnams kyi rang rang gi phyogs na gnas
T02D1852:134a-11: pa'i log 'dren rnams ske nas bcings shing snying ga
T02D1852:134a-12: ru btab ste bkug nas gnas rnams su mngon du
T02D1852:134a-13: phyogs par 'god par byed par bsam par bya'o //
T02D1852:134a-14: khyab 'jug la sogs pa rnams kyi kha dog la sogs pa brjod par bya ste /
T02D1852:134a-15: mkha' lding sa srung dag la zhon //
T02D1852:134a-16: sprin dang 'dzam bu'i gser mdog can //
T02D1852:134a-18: khyab 'jug brgya byin zhes bya dag / dbang po yi ni phyogs su'o //
T02D1852:134a-19: dmar po me thab phreng ba thogs //
T02D1852:134a-20: ra skyes la zhon drang srong bcas //
T02D1852:134a-21: me lha me yi phyogs su'o //
T02D1852:134a-22: gshin rje nag po dbyug pa thogs //
T02D1852:134a-23: ma he la zhon 'khor dang bcas //
T02D1852:134a-24: gshin rje yi ni phyogs su'o //
T02D1852:134a-25: bden bral sprin ltar snang ba ni //
T02D1852:134a-26: yi dags la zhon ral gri thogs //
T02D1852:134a-27: bden bral gyi ni phyogs su'o //
T02D1852:134a-28: lag 'gro la zhon zhags pa thogs //
T02D1852:134a-29: chu lha zla ba lta bu ni //
T02D1852:134a-30: 'khor bcas pa chu yi phyogs su'o //
T02D1852:134a-31: ri dags la zhon pa bla'i mdog //
T02D1852:134a-32: rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'i rlung lha ni //
T02D1852:134a-34: rtsangs pa dang ni mi la zhon //
T02D1852:134a-35: la thu dpal 'bras dag thogs shong //
T02D1852:134a-36: zla ba dang ni gser lta bu'o ;
T02D1852:134a-37: / bgegs dag lus ngan po dag ni /
T02D1852:134a-38: ma lus bgegs dang sprin sogs kyi //
T02D1852:134a-39: 'khor gyi tshogs dang yang dag ldan //
T02D1852:134a-40: lus ngan po yi phyogs su'o //
T02D1852:134a-41: glang la zhon zhing rtse gsum thogs //
T02D1852:134a-42: 'khor bcas zla ba ltar snang ba //
T02D1852:134a-43: dbang phyug chen po dbang ldan du'o //
T02D1852:134a-47: lag na me thab dang phreng ba /
T02D1852:134a-48: padma dang ku mu da thogs pa /
T02D1852:134a-51: me tog ku mu da la gnas pa'i tshangs pa dang /
T02D1852:134a-52: nyi ma dang zla ba rnams 'khor dang bcas pa rnams ni steng du'o //
T02D1852:134a-53: shing rta la zhon ral gri thogs //
T02D1852:134b-0: ljang gu drag po lha @134b min dbang //
T02D1852:134b-1: bu dang chung ma 'khor bcas pa'i /
T02D1852:134b-2: thags bzangs ris ni sa 'og tu //
T02D1852:134b-3: sa yi lha mo kha dog ser //
T02D1852:134b-4: bum pa ser po lag na thogs //
T02D1852:134b-5: lus kyi phyed ni nges phyung ba //
T02D1852:134b-6: ma lus klu bcas dgod par bya //
T02D1852:134b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhe sdang rdo rje nyid
T02D1852:134b-8: kyis m'a ma k'i'i chos 'byung na gnas pa'i byang
T02D1852:134b-9: chub kyi sems kyi zla ba la yi ge h'um
T02D1852:134b-10: bcu bsams te / de rnams grub pa'i khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba //
T02D1852:134b-11: lte ba man chad phur bu'i rnam pa can /
T02D1852:134b-12: stong 'chad par 'gyur ba'i zhal dang phyag la sogs pa dang ldan pa /
T02D1852:134b-13: yi ge gsum byin gyis brlabs pa bcu phyung nas /
T02D1852:134b-14: gnod mdzes la bka' bsgos te /
T02D1852:134b-15: de rnams lag pa g-yon pas bzung nas /
T02D1852:134b-16: shar la sogs pa'i phyogs na gnas pa'i /
T02D1852:134b-17: khyab 'jug la sogs pa'i bgegs kyi tshogs rnams kyi
T02D1852:134b-18: mgo'i steng du lag pa g-yas pa'i rdo rje tho
T02D1852:134b-19: ba dang / 'dis phur bu gdab par bya'o //
T02D1852:134b-21: gh'a ta ya gh'a ta ya /
T02D1852:134b-23: k'i la ya k'i la ya /
T02D1852:134b-25: h'um h'um h'um badzra k'i la ya badzra dha ro a'adzny'a pa ya ti /
T02D1852:134b-26: bishn'a d'i na bighn'am k'a ya w'a ka tsitta badzram k'i la ya h'um phat /
T02D1852:134b-27: yang na rim pa dgug pa dang phur bus gdab par bya'o //
T02D1852:134b-28: khro bo rnams kyi 'od kyis reg pa dang /
T02D1852:134b-29: de bzhin du bdag nyid kyi 'od zer 'bar bas
T02D1852:134b-30: sha za ba la sogs pa rnams thal bar gyur
T02D1852:134b-31: par kun du bsam par bya'o //
T02D1852:134b-32: yi ge ram las nges 'byung ba'i //
T02D1852:134b-33: me yi 'khor los phyogs rnams ni //
T02D1852:134b-34: kun nas bcing bar mkhas pa yis //
T02D1852:134b-35: mdor na yang dag brtag par bya //
T02D1852:134b-36: lam gyi sa bon las byung ba'i //
T02D1852:134b-37: dbang chen gyi ni dkyil 'khor gyi ;
T02D1852:134b-38: / phyogs rnams mtha' yi mtshams su ni //
T02D1852:134b-39: kun nas yongs su bcing bar bya //
T02D1852:134b-40: bskal pa yi ni me ltar snang //
T02D1852:134b-41: rdo rje dag las byas pa yi //
T02D1852:134b-42: ra ba phur bu'i nang gnas pa //
T02D1852:134b-43: h'um byung kun nas bsam par bya //
T02D1852:134b-45: mtshams bcing ba las nang ra ba las phyi rol du bgegs rnams phur bus gdab par bya'o //
T02D1852:134b-47: rab tu 'bar ba'i me ltar snang //
T02D1852:134b-49: rdo rje dra ba rgya chen po //
T02D1852:134b-50: ra ba'i nang du bsam par bya //
T02D1852:134b-52: mchog gyur rgyud kyi don dang mthun //
T02D1852:135a-2: / gnas ni kun nas bsrungs 'gyur na //
T02D1852:135a-3: nam yang sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang //
T02D1852:135a-4: gzhig par nus pa ma yin nyid //
T02D1852:135a-5: gal te de lta na yang bgegs gzhom par ma nus na /
T02D1852:135a-6: de'i tshe don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1852:135a-7: de lta bur gyur ba'i sems gang yin pa la /
T02D1852:135a-8: bgegs rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni gnas med cing skabs med de /
T02D1852:135a-9: bgegs la sogs pa rnams ni tha mal pa'i rnam
T02D1852:135a-10: par rtog pa las byung ba nyid yin pa'i phyir
T02D1852:135a-11: ro // de ltar bsrung ba'i cho ga yongs su
T02D1852:135a-12: rdzogs nas 'bras bu grub par bya ba'i phyir de
T02D1852:135a-13: bzhin du rten gyi bdag po rdo rje 'chang chen
T02D1852:135a-14: po gcig pu'i lhag par mos pa dang ldan pa
T02D1852:135a-15: der rang gi snying gar yi ge hr'i: las padma
T02D1852:135a-17: de'i steng du yi ge aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D1852:135a-18: de'i steng du yi ge h'um las rdo rje rtse
T02D1852:135a-19: lnga pa 'bar ba dbus na yi ge h'um gis
T02D1852:135a-21: de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis lus la sogs pa rnams mi snang bar byas la /
T02D1852:135a-22: dngos po med pa sgom pa med //
T02D1852:135a-23: bsgom par bya ba sgom pa min //
T02D1852:135a-24: de ltar dngos po dngos med pas //
T02D1852:135a-25: sgom pa dmigs su med pa'o //
T02D1852:135a-26: zhes bya ba 'dis chos thams cad bdag med par bsgoms te /
T02D1852:135a-27: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba
T02D1852:135a-28: a'atma ko& ham zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis byin gyis
T02D1852:135a-29: brlab par bya'o // de nas yi ge h'um yid
T02D1852:135a-30: kyis brjod cing zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na
T02D1852:135a-31: gnas pa kun du bzang po dang yang dag par
T02D1852:135a-32: ldan pa'i rdo rje 'chang chen por bdag nyid rnam
T02D1852:135a-33: brlab par bya'o // par bsgoms te / rang gi
T02D1852:135a-34: ba spu'i bu ga'i gseb nas byung ba'i 'od zer
T02D1852:135a-35: gyi tshogs rnams kyis nam mkha'i dbyings khyab pa'i de
T02D1852:135a-36: bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa rnams yang dag par
T02D1852:135a-37: brlab par bya'o // par bsgoms te / bkug nas
T02D1852:135a-38: / rang gi lus dang sangs rgyas spyan la sogs
T02D1852:135a-39: pa rig ma'i lus la bcug ste /
T02D1852:135a-40: las la gnas pas zag pa med pa'i bde ba mchog gi gnas skabs thob pa las /
T02D1852:135a-41: gnyi ga yang zhu bar gyur te /
T02D1852:135a-42: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par gyur par blta bar bya zhing /
T02D1852:135a-43: zla ba de la yi ge aa la sogs pa ksha la thug pa mgo steng du bstan zhing /
T02D1852:135a-44: steng na thig les mtshan pa bsams la /
T02D1852:135b-0: @135b yi ge aa la sogs pa rnams ni sangs
T02D1852:135b-1: rgyas spyan la sogs pa'i lha mo'i rnam pa dang
T02D1852:135b-2: / yi ge ka la sogs pa rnams ni de
T02D1852:135b-3: bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dkyil 'khor pa'i lha
T02D1852:135b-4: rnams kyi gzugs su nges par bsams te /
T02D1852:135b-5: de rnams kyi thugs kar padma dang zla ba la gnas pa'i rang gi sa bon gyis bskyed pa /
T02D1852:135b-6: rang gi rigs kyi phyag mtshan dbus na sa bon de rnams kyis mtshan pa bsams la /
T02D1852:135b-7: h'um gi sa bon las byung ba'i 'od zer sngon po lcags kyu'i rnam par spros nas /
T02D1852:135b-8: mngon par dga' ba'i nam mkha'i dbyings na bzhugs pa'i
T02D1852:135b-9: ye shes sems dpa'i rdo rje'i lam nas zhugs te
T02D1852:135b-10: / thugs yang dag par bskul la zhal nas byung ba nas /
T02D1852:135b-11: rig ma'i 'khor lo la zhugs shing thugs bskul te
T02D1852:135b-12: padma nas byung ba'i rim pas mi bskyod pa la
T02D1852:135b-13: sogs pa rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi ye shes
T02D1852:135b-15: de'i rigs kyi dam tshig sems dpa' rnams kyi thugs kar bzhugs par bya'o //
T02D1852:135b-16: de bzhin du thugs ka nas gnas pa'i phyag mtshan
T02D1852:135b-17: gyi steng gi sa bon las byung ba rang dang
T02D1852:135b-18: rjes su mthun pa'i kha dog dang ldan pa'i rim
T02D1852:135b-23: 'jig rten gyi khams rnams na bzhugs pa'i de zhin gshegs pa dang /
T02D1852:135b-24: rin po che dang padma dang las kyi rigs kyi
T02D1852:135b-25: ye shes kyi 'khor lo de dang de'i rigs rnams
T02D1852:135b-26: kyi thugs kar gzhug cing ka kan 'di'i 'jig rten
T02D1852:135b-27: gyi khams na gnas pa'i lha mo'i 'khor lo de
T02D1852:135b-29: / de nas phan tshun 'dus pa'i rol pa'i bde
T02D1852:135b-30: ba nyams su myong ba'i dbang gis zhu bar gyur
T02D1852:135b-31: nas chos 'byung gi rnam par gyur par blta bar
T02D1852:135b-32: bya'o // de nas de ru m'a ma k'i dang
T02D1852:135b-33: ldan pa'i mi bskyod pa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa
T02D1852:135b-34: ye shes sems dpa' thugs kar bcug nas rol pa
T02D1852:135b-35: la thug pas ye shes kyi phreng bas khyab pa'i
T02D1852:135b-36: rgya mtsho chen po'i gzugs su gyur par bya'o //
T02D1852:135b-37: de bzhin du sangs rgyas spyan dang ldan pa'i rnam
T02D1852:135b-38: par snang mdzad la ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa
T02D1852:135b-39: dang rol pa dang zhu bar gyur pa thim pa'i
T02D1852:135b-40: sgo nas chu'i khams sra ba'i rnam par byin gyis
T02D1852:136a-1: rin po che'i dam tshig dang ldan pa'i rin chen 'byung ldan thim pas rgya che bar gyur pa'o //
T02D1852:136a-2: gos dkar mo dang ldan pa'i 'od dpag tu med
T02D1852:136a-3: pa zhugs pas ye shes kyi 'bar ba'i phreng bas
T02D1852:136a-4: khyab par byin gyis brlab po //
T02D1852:136a-5: sgrol ma dang ldan pa'i don yod par grub pa
T02D1852:136a-6: zhugs pas bsdus te gru bzhi pa'i rnam pa'i ye
T02D1852:136a-7: shes kyi sa gzhir byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D1852:136a-8: de nas sa'i cha der gser gyi ri bo lta bu'i yi ge bhr'um bkod de /
T02D1852:136a-9: de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis nam
T02D1852:136a-10: mkha'i dbyings khyab pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bkug
T02D1852:136a-11: la bcug ste / 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa'i gzugs su bsams la /
T02D1852:136a-12: de gyur pa'i rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma
T02D1852:136a-13: dang ldan pa'i rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku las
T02D1852:136a-14: byung ba rin po che sna bzhi'i rang bzhin can
T02D1852:136a-15: gyi mchod rten gyi dbyibs can 'od zer gyi phreng
T02D1852:136a-16: bas rnam par brgyan cing dpag tshad bye pa'i khyon
T02D1852:136a-17: dang ldan pa'i gnas bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1852:136a-18: de'i 'og gzhir yi ge ha las byung ba'i sna
T02D1852:136a-19: tshogs rdo rje sa 'og la thug par kun du
T02D1852:136a-20: khyab par gnas par blta bar bya'o //
T02D1852:136a-22: zur bzhi pa la gru bzhi pa //
T02D1852:136a-23: rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan //
T02D1852:136a-24: dril bu ba dan gos sogs kyis //
T02D1852:136a-25: sgo dang sgo khyud rnam par brgyan //
T02D1852:136a-26: mtshams kyi cha ni thams cad du //
T02D1852:136a-27: rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis mdzes //
T02D1852:136a-28: dra ba dra ba phyed pas spras //
T02D1852:136a-29: zla ba nyi ma sogs pas brgyan //
T02D1852:136a-30: bla re bris shing sna tshogs pa'i //
T02D1852:136a-31: gos dang phreng bas rnam par brgyan //
T02D1852:136a-32: thig bzhi dag gis yongs su bskor //
T02D1852:136a-33: ka ba brgyad kyis kun nas bteg / de yi dbus su 'khor lo ni //
T02D1852:136a-34: kun nas yongs su zlum por dgod //
T02D1852:136a-35: lha rnams kun gyi gnas su ni //
T02D1852:136a-36: yi ge hr'i las byung ba yi //
T02D1852:136a-37: sna tshogs padma lte ba dang //
T02D1852:136a-38: ge sar ldan pa bsam par bya //
T02D1852:136a-39: dbus su zla ba rnam par bsgom //
T02D1852:136a-40: rnam snang rigs la de bzhin no //
T02D1852:136a-41: rin po che ni cha brgyad pa //
T02D1852:136a-42: bsam bya rin chen rigs kyi'o //
T02D1852:136a-43: de bzhin padma rigs kyi ni //
T02D1852:136a-45: las kyi rigs kyi rnal 'byor pa //
T02D1852:136a-46: gru gsum me dang yang dag mtshungs //
T02D1852:136b-0: gdan ni mtsho skyes steng du @136b bsam ;
T02D1852:136b-1: / phyag na rdo rje m'a ma k'i //
T02D1852:136b-2: khyad par du ni khro rnams kyi //
T02D1852:136b-4: bdag nyid chen po rnams kyis bsam //
T02D1852:136b-5: de ltar gnas dang gdan rnams bskyed nas lha rnams bskyed pa'i phyir //
T02D1852:136b-6: dbus kyi gdan la sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis nye bar 'dug ste ;
T02D1852:136b-7: snga ma bzhin du rdo rje 'chang chen por lhag par mos pa dang ldan pa /
T02D1852:136b-8: aom sh'u n+ya t'a zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i
T02D1852:136b-9: sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i cho ga'i rjes la
T02D1852:136b-10: / srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du so sor brtags te /
T02D1852:136b-11: shes rab dang snying rje'i bdag nyid can /
T02D1852:136b-12: g-yas dang g-yon dkar zhing dmar la padma'i sdong bu'i
T02D1852:136b-13: skud pa dang mtshungs pa'i skye ba med pa'i ri
T02D1852:136b-14: mo kha gyen du bltas pa zhu ba'i gzugs can
T02D1852:136b-15: bsdus nas thig le'u zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam
T02D1852:136b-16: par gyur par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1852:136b-17: de nas zla ba de la snga ma bzhin du
T02D1852:136b-18: a'a li k'a li'i rnam par bkod la dbyangs dang
T02D1852:136b-19: yi ge rnams lha'i rnam par gyur cing ye shes
T02D1852:136b-20: kyi lha'i 'khor lo bcug la rol pa la thug
T02D1852:136b-22: zhu ba'i gzugs can gyi zla ba gsal ba la
T02D1852:136b-23: steng dang bar dang 'og tu rim bzhin du zla
T02D1852:136b-24: ba dang padma dang nyi ma la gnas pa dkar
T02D1852:136b-25: po dang / dmar po dang sngon po'i aom a'a:
T02D1852:136b-26: h'um zhes bya ba'i yi ge gsum gyi bdag nyid
T02D1852:136b-27: kyi byang chub kyi sems bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1852:136b-28: de nas rang gi yi ge gsum las byung ba'i
T02D1852:136b-29: 'od zer gyi tshogs rnams kyis 'gro ba drug gi
T02D1852:136b-31: sangs rgyas dang rdo rje 'chang la sogs pa rnams la yang dag par reg nas /
T02D1852:136b-32: nyi ma dang zla ba dang padma la gnas pa'i yi ge gsum du byas te /
T02D1852:136b-33: ye shes kyi 'od zer gyi lcags kyu de rnams
T02D1852:136b-34: nyid kyis bkug nas bdag nyid kyi yi ge gsum
T02D1852:136b-36: de nas sems can ma lus pa sdud par byed
T02D1852:136b-37: pa'i snying rje chen po'i bdag nyid kyi byang chub
T02D1852:136b-38: kyi sems de / aom dharma dh'a tu sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1852:136b-39: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlab pa'i sgo
T02D1852:136b-40: nas snying rje dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid kyi
T02D1852:136b-41: dmar po dang dkar po snang ba'i zla ba'i dkyil
T02D1852:136b-42: 'khor gyi rnam par gyur par blta bar bya'o //
T02D1852:136b-43: de nas de la yi ge h'um mgo gyen du bltas pa bsams la /
T02D1852:137a-0: de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs rnams @137a * //
T02D1852:137a-1: kyis nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad khyab pa'i de bzhin
T02D1852:137a-2: gshegs pa la sogs pa rnams bkug nas bcug ste
T02D1852:137a-4: dang po'i rdo rje dkar dmar du gyur te /
T02D1852:137a-6: zhes bya ba'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas rdo rje
T02D1852:137a-7: las byung ba'i rdo rje 'chang chen por bdag nyid
T02D1852:137a-9: bdag ni rdo rje 'chang chen po yin no zhes
T02D1852:137a-10: bya ba'i nga rgyal yang bya'o zhes bya ba ni
T02D1852:137a-11: rnal 'byor ro // de nas snying gar yi ge
T02D1852:137a-12: hr'i dang aa las byung ba'i padma dang zla ba
T02D1852:137a-13: rnal 'byor ro // dag bsams te / der snga
T02D1852:137a-14: ma bzhin du ye shes sems dpa' bcug la de
T02D1852:137a-15: dang lhan cig tha mi dad pa'i nga rgyal bya'o
T02D1852:137a-16: zhes bya ba ni rjes su rnal 'byor ro //
T02D1852:137a-17: de nas aom sv'a a'a:h'a h'um zhes bya ba 'di rnams kyis /
T02D1852:137a-22: rnam par shes pa'i phung po rnams /
T02D1852:137a-27: mi bskyod pa'i rang bzhin du bsams la /
T02D1852:137a-31: badzra ra ti h'um zhes bya ba de rnams kyis /
T02D1852:137a-32: phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid can gyi /
T02D1852:137a-42: kun du bzang mo'i rang bzhin du'o //
T02D1852:137a-43: thlim aom aom aom ham aom zhes bya ba de rnams kyis /
T02D1852:137a-54: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /
T02D1852:137a-55: kun du bzang po'i rang bzhin du'o //
T02D1852:137a-60: ces bya ba la de rnams kyis //
T02D1852:137a-61: dpung pa g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dang kha dang gsang ba'i rdo rje rnams /
T02D1852:137a-63: gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang /
T02D1852:137a-65: bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i rang bzhin du bsam par bya ste /
T02D1852:137a-66: 'di lta bu ni tha mal pa'i phung po la sogs pa rnams kyi gnyen po yin no //
T02D1852:137a-67: de nas brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i dngos po thams cad dang /
T02D1852:137a-68: sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i rang bzhin dang ldan pa
T02D1852:137a-69: mun pa la sgron ma bzhin du rnam par rtog
T02D1852:137b-0: pa'i mun pa ma lus pa rab tu bcom @137b
T02D1852:137b-1: zhing nyi ma'i 'od zer lta bu'i ye shes kyi
T02D1852:137b-2: snang ba'i bdag nyid kyis kun du gsal bar gyur
T02D1852:137b-4: sku la sogs pa byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
T02D1852:137b-5: bar snang la rang gis sprul pa'i sku rdo rje'i
T02D1852:137b-6: tshogs nam mkha'i dbyings khyab pa'i dbus na bzhugs pa'i
T02D1852:137b-8: rang gi spyi bor zla ba'i gzugs la gnas pa'i yi ge aom dkar po bltas la /
T02D1852:137b-9: de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis bskyed pa'i sangs rgyas spyan /
T02D1852:137b-10: rang gis sprul pa'i sangs rgyas spyan gyi tshogs nam
T02D1852:137b-11: mkha'i dbyings khyab pa'i dbus na bzhugs pa spros te
T02D1852:137b-12: / des bdag po dang sprul pa rnams kyis sprul pa rnams mnyes par byas nas /
T02D1852:137b-13: lag ngar gyi zhags pa rnams kyis bkug ste mdun
T02D1852:137b-14: na gnas pa'i padma dang zla ba la bzhugs pa
T02D1852:137b-15: la / tshigs su bcad pas gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
T02D1852:137b-16: dpal ldan sangs rgyas sku 'chang ba //
T02D1852:137b-17: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pa'i //
T02D1852:137b-18: rdo rje sku yis deng bdag ni //
T02D1852:137b-19: byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol //
T02D1852:137b-20: thog ma dang tha ma med pa de la brten
T02D1852:137b-21: nas grub pa gzhan rnams la yang gsol ba gdab
T02D1852:137b-22: par bya ste / phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
T02D1852:137b-23: rdo rje mi phye gsum bsgoms pa'i //
T02D1852:137b-24: rdo rje sku yis deng bdag ni //
T02D1852:137b-25: byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol ;
T02D1852:137b-26: / sangs rgyas spyan dang bcas pa thams cad chu'i
T02D1852:137b-27: rlabs bzhin du rang gi lus la zhugs nas mtshan
T02D1852:137b-28: dang dpe byad thams cad kyis rnam par spras par
T02D1852:137b-29: bdag nyid bltas la nga rgyal bya ste /
T02D1852:137b-30: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gang yin //
T02D1852:137b-31: phung po lnga yis rab gang ba //
T02D1852:137b-32: sangs rgyas sku yi ngo bo yis //
T02D1852:137b-33: bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar shog / de nas /
T02D1852:137b-34: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1852:137b-35: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D1852:137b-36: de nas de kho na bzhin du rang gi tshogs
T02D1852:137b-37: kyi dbus na bzhugs pa'i 'od dpag tu med pa'o
T02D1852:137b-38: / lkog ma'i chu skyes la gnas pa'i yi ge
T02D1852:137b-39: a'a: dmar po las gos dkar mo spros te mnyes
T02D1852:137b-40: par byas la bkug ste mdun gyi mtsho skyes kyi
T02D1852:137b-41: steng gi padma la bzhugs pa la gsol ba gdab
T02D1852:137b-42: / par bya ste / chos kyi gsung lam dpal dang ldan //
T02D1852:137b-43: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pa'i //
T02D1852:137b-44: rdo rje gsung gis deng bdag ni //
T02D1852:137b-45: byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol //
T02D1852:138a-1: bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
T02D1852:138a-2: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pa'i //
T02D1852:138a-3: rdo rje gsung gis deng bdag ni //
T02D1852:138a-4: byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol //
T02D1852:138a-5: de nas de rnams bcug pas dung g-yas su 'khyil
T02D1852:138a-6: pa rgya chen po la gnas shing rang gi bzhin
T02D1852:138a-8: chos thams cad kyi gnas kyi rang bzhin du gyur
T02D1852:138a-9: cing gsung dbyangs thams cad rnam par dag pa'i mtshan
T02D1852:138a-10: nyid dang ldan pa'i lce rnam par bsgoms nas nga
T02D1852:138a-11: rgyal bya ste / rdo rje chos kyi gsung gang yin //
T02D1852:138a-12: nges pa'i tshig ni phun sum tshogs //
T02D1852:138a-13: bdag gi tshig kyang de 'dra zhing //
T02D1852:138a-14: chos 'dzin pa dang 'dra bar shog / aom sarba
T02D1852:138a-15: ta th'a ga ta w'a ka badzra sva bh'a ba
T02D1852:138a-16: a'atma ko& ham / de kho na bzhin du thugs
T02D1852:138a-17: ka'i nyi ma la gnas pa'i yi ge h'um mthing
T02D1852:138a-18: shun lta bu las m'a ma k'i spro ba sngon
T02D1852:138a-19: du 'gro ba can gyi mdun padma la gnas pa
T02D1852:138a-20: la gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
T02D1852:138a-21: dpal ldan rdo rje thugs 'chang ba //
T02D1852:138a-22: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pa'i //
T02D1852:138a-23: rdo rje thugs kyis deng bdag ni //
T02D1852:138a-24: byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol //
T02D1852:138a-25: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
T02D1852:138a-26: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pa'i //
T02D1852:138a-27: rdo rje thugs kyis deng bdag ni //
T02D1852:138a-28: byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol //
T02D1852:138a-29: de rnams bcug par gyur pa nyid kyis yi ge
T02D1852:138a-30: h'um las byung ba'i padma dang zla ba chos thams
T02D1852:138a-31: cad 'byung ba'i phyag rgya 'od zer gyi phreng ba
T02D1852:138a-32: 'phro ba bltas la nga rgyal byas te /
T02D1852:138a-33: sems dpa' rgyal ba sras rnams kyi //
T02D1852:138a-34: sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan nyid thugs //
T02D1852:138a-35: mkha' dang mtshungs pa gang yin pa /
T02D1852:138a-36: bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar shog / gsang ba'i dbang po blo ldan pa //
T02D1852:138a-37: kun du bzang po'i thugs gang yin //
T02D1852:138a-38: bdag gi sems kyang de 'dra zhing //
T02D1852:138a-39: rdo rje 'chang dang mtshungs par shog / aom sarba
T02D1852:138a-40: ta th'a ga ta tsitta bdzra sva bh'a ba a'atma
T02D1852:138a-41: ko& ham / de ltar byin gyis brlabs nas bdag / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
T02D1852:138a-42: sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gnas shing //
T02D1852:138a-43: zla ba'i mdog tu rnam par bsgom //
T02D1852:138a-44: rnam pa mchog rnams kun ldan zhing //
T02D1852:138a-45: rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan //
T02D1852:138a-46: shes rab ye shes dbang bskur ldan //
T02D1852:138a-47: ral pa'i cod pan ngag gis brgyan //
T02D1852:138a-48: dpa' bo zhal gsum phyag drug ste //
T02D1852:138b-0: zhi zhing @138b sgeg pa'i gzugs dang ldan //
T02D1852:138b-1: g-yas pa drag cing sngo ba ste //
T02D1852:138b-2: g-yon dmar zhal ni dkar ba'o //
T02D1852:138b-3: sna tshogs 'od zer tshogs rnams kyi //
T02D1852:138b-4: nam mkha'i dbyings ni ma lus khyab //
T02D1852:138b-5: rdo rje ye shes lnga rang bzhin //
T02D1852:138b-6: 'od zer lnga yis rnam par brgyan //
T02D1852:138b-7: sangs rgyas sprin ni spro byed pa //
T02D1852:138b-8: de yi phyag tu rnam par bsam //
T02D1852:138b-9: gnyis pa na ni 'khor lo che //
T02D1852:138b-10: rtsibs brgyad zla ba dang mtshungs shing //
T02D1852:138b-11: bdud dang bgegs kun gcod byed pa //
T02D1852:138b-12: thogs pa rnam par bsam par bya //
T02D1852:138b-13: 'od kyi sprin gyis kun khyab cing //
T02D1852:138b-14: gsang dang 'o ma ltar dkar ba //
T02D1852:138b-15: 'dod chags thams cad dag byed pa'i //
T02D1852:138b-16: padma chen po gsum par ro //
T02D1852:138b-17: g-yon na dril bu rab dmar zhing //
T02D1852:138b-18: zla ba lta bu'i 'od dang ldan //
T02D1852:138b-19: chos rnams sgra brnyan lta bur ni //
T02D1852:138b-20: sgra yis rtogs par byed pa rnams //
T02D1852:138b-21: rdo rje 'bar bas rnam brgyan cing //
T02D1852:138b-22: nyi ma 'char ka dang mtshungs pa //
T02D1852:138b-23: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa'i //
T02D1852:138b-24: rin po che ni gnyis pa na //
T02D1852:138b-26: phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad kyi //
T02D1852:138b-27: nyon mongs mi shes gcod byed pa //
T02D1852:138b-28: ral gri chen por gsum par ro //
T02D1852:138b-31: zla ba nyi ma dri med pa //
T02D1852:138b-32: stong pas lhag par mkhas pas bsam //
T02D1852:138b-33: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor chen po'o //
T02D1852:138b-34: de nas ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i padma dang
T02D1852:138b-35: zla ba la gnas pa'i rdo rje'i lte bar yi
T02D1852:138b-37: dam tshig dang sdom pa la gnas pas bsnyen pa
T02D1852:138b-38: la sogs pa'i cho ga sngon du 'gro ba can
T02D1852:138b-39: gyis sgrub pa chen po brtsam par bya ste /
T02D1852:138b-40: gzugs dang lang tsho dag gis brgyan //
T02D1852:138b-42: sme sha can ni bdag nyid che //
T02D1852:138b-43: rgyan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs //
T02D1852:138b-44: dri dang me tog rnams kyis brgyan //
T02D1852:138b-45: na tshod lo ni bcu gnyis ldan //
T02D1852:138b-46: bu mo mig yangs rnyed nas ni //
T02D1852:138b-47: blangs te bsgrub pa brtsam par bya //
T02D1852:138b-48: de ni mdun du gzhag bya ste //
T02D1852:138b-49: khro bo h'um las byung ba yi //
T02D1852:138b-50: rdo rje 'bar ldan nyi ma'i gzugs //
T02D1852:138b-52: dang por de yi snying gar bsam //
T02D1852:138b-53: de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis //
T02D1852:138b-54: de ni thal bar byas blta zhing //
T02D1852:138b-55: rnam shes mar me lta bu yin //
T02D1852:139a-2: h'um las 'od zer sngon po'i tshogs //
T02D1852:139a-3: sna khung g-yas nas spros na sa ni //
T02D1852:139a-4: de yis mar me de bcing ste //
T02D1852:139a-5: de bzhin sna khung g-yon nas ni //
T02D1852:139a-6: de nyid kyis ni gzhug par bya //
T02D1852:139a-7: ye shes sems dpa'i lam nas ni //
T02D1852:139a-8: rdo rje'i lam nas nges byung ste ;
T02D1852:139a-9: / rig ma'i padmar gzhag byas nas //
T02D1852:139a-10: nur nur po la sogs pa dang //
T02D1852:139a-11: yan lag sor mo lnga rim gyis //
T02D1852:139a-12: rig ma yi ni gzugs su 'grub //
T02D1852:139a-13: rig ma'i chu skyes nas byung ste //
T02D1852:139a-14: rang gi rdo rje'i lam nas byung //
T02D1852:139a-15: g-yas pa yi ni gsum pa yis //
T02D1852:139a-17: ma tog bzang po sna tshogs kyis //
T02D1852:139a-18: spyi bo la ni rnam par brgyan //
T02D1852:139a-19: lhag ma thams cad bdag po dang //
T02D1852:139a-20: mtshungs par bsams nas rigs lnga dgod //
T02D1852:139a-21: mgo dang snying ga dang lte ba dang gsang ba
T02D1852:139a-22: dang rkang pa'i steng du padma la gnas pa'i zla
T02D1852:139a-23: ba dang nyi ma dang rin po che dang /
T02D1852:139a-26: zhes bya ba de rnams las byung ba'i rnam par
T02D1852:139a-27: snang mdzad la sogs pa rang rang gi rig ma
T02D1852:139a-28: dang gnyis su med par gyur pa /
T02D1852:139a-29: sangs rgyas spyan la sogs pa lha mo bzhis yongs su bskor ba rnams bsams par bya'o //
T02D1852:139a-30: de ltar rigs lngas khyab par byas nas rjes su
T02D1852:139a-31: rnal 'byor gyi sgo nas de'i snying gar ye shes
T02D1852:139a-33: de'i sra ba nyid ni sangs rgyas spyan gyi rang bzhin gyi nu ma gnyis dang /
T02D1852:139a-34: chu'i khams ni m'a ma k'i'i rang bzhin gyi mchu dang /
T02D1852:139a-35: me'i khams ni gos dkar mo'i rnam pa padma dang /
T02D1852:139a-36: rlung gi khams ni sgrol ma'i rnam pa g-yo ba'i bya ba dang /
T02D1852:139a-37: nam mkha'i ni kun du bzang mo'i rang bzhin gyi mtsho skyes kyi khang stong dang /
T02D1852:139a-38: de'i gzugs ni gzugs rdo rje ma dang /
T02D1852:139a-39: tshig dang sid kyi sgra la sogs pa ni sgra rdo rje ma dang /
T02D1852:139a-40: dri tshor bas tshim pa ni dri rdo rje ma dang /
T02D1852:139a-41: de'i mchu ni ro myang ba dang /
T02D1852:139a-42: bde ba'i ro myang ba ni ro rdo rje ma dang ;
T02D1852:139a-44: dbang po'i reg bya bde ba ni reg bya rdo rje ma dang /
T02D1852:139a-45: mchog tu dga' ba ni chos kyi dbyings rdo rje ma'i rang bzhin dang /
T02D1852:139a-46: dpung pa g-yon pa ni ro langs ma dang /
T02D1852:139a-47: g-yas pa ni gzhan gyis mi thub ma dang /
T02D1852:139a-48: kha ni khro gnyer can dang /
T02D1852:139b-0: padma ni ral pa gcig pa'i @139b rang bzhin du
T02D1852:139b-1: blta bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni man ngag yin
T02D1852:139b-2: no // de nas yi ge h'um las byung zhing
T02D1852:139b-3: rig ma'i tshogs mtha' yas pa rjes su chags par
T02D1852:139b-4: byed pa'i snying rje chen po dang /
T02D1852:139b-5: 'dod chags rnam par dag pa'i sgo nas dkar dmar
T02D1852:139b-6: du snang zhing dang po'i rdo rje'i rang bzhin can
T02D1852:139b-7: / 'od zer sna tshogs kyi phreng ba can /
T02D1852:139b-8: aom gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i rin po che 'bar
T02D1852:139b-9: ba'i nor bu dang ldan pa'i rang gi gsang ba'i
T02D1852:139b-11: yi ge aa las rig ma'i padma bsam //
T02D1852:139b-12: rnam par shes pa brgyad rnam par dag pas 'dab ma dkar dmar brgyad dang ldan zhing /
T02D1852:139b-13: sprul pa mtha' yas pas 'gro ba rnams kyi don byed pa'i phyir ge sar dang bcas pa /
T02D1852:139b-14: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i sgo nas
T02D1852:139b-15: sems can gyi rgyud yongs su rdzogs par byed par
T02D1852:139b-16: byed pa'i phyir lte ba ser po dang ldan zhing
T02D1852:139b-17: 'od zer rnam par tha dad pas 'bar ba /
T02D1852:139b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa lha ma lus pa mnyes par byed par bsams te /
T02D1852:139b-19: de yang zla ba la sogs pa kha dog gi
T02D1852:139b-20: 'od zer gyis gsal ba'i sgo nas yid 'phrog par
T02D1852:139b-22: de nas rdo rje las byung ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs padma'i lam nas zhugs te /
T02D1852:139b-23: lha mo'i 'khor lo rjes su mnyes par byas nas /
T02D1852:139b-24: 'od zer gyi tshogs rig ma'i kha nas phyung ste /
T02D1852:139b-25: bdag nyid kyi kha nas zhugs nas rdo rje'i lam nas byung ste /
T02D1852:139b-26: der gnas par blta bar bya'o //
T02D1852:139b-27: de bzhin du padma las byung ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs rdo rje'i lam nas zhugs te /
T02D1852:139b-28: lha'i 'khor lo mnyes par byas nas /
T02D1852:139b-29: rang gi kha nas byung ste rig ma'i khar zhugs nas padma nas byung ste /
T02D1852:139b-30: de nyid du gnas par bsam par bya'o //
T02D1852:139b-31: de nas de bstod pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i klu
T02D1852:139b-32: rnams kyi sgo nas sgyu ma'i dga' ba don du
T02D1852:139b-33: gnyer ba byed par dmigs la /
T02D1852:139b-34: rin chen dpal gyi nga rgyal dang ldan zhing dga'
T02D1852:139b-35: ba la shin tu brtson pas rang gi dam tshig
T02D1852:139b-37: 'dod chags ma yin chags bral min //
T02D1852:139b-38: bar ma yang ni mi dmigs la //
T02D1852:139b-39: bud med sgyu ma'i phyag rgya 'di //
T02D1852:139b-40: gnyis med theg pa bla med yin //
T02D1852:139b-41: zhes lhag par mos par byas te /
T02D1852:139b-42: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nu r'a ga na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham //
T02D1852:140a-2: rjes su chags pa brtsam par bya //
T02D1852:140a-3: lag ngar dag gis de la ni //
T02D1852:140a-4: dam du 'khyud nas rang brang gis //
T02D1852:140a-5: sngags pas de yi brang steng du //
T02D1852:140a-6: nu ma rgyas pa btsir bar bya //
T02D1852:140a-7: lag pa g-yas pas de yi skra //
T02D1852:140a-8: rol pa dang bcas bzung nas ni //
T02D1852:140a-9: g-yon pas bzhin ni bteg byas nas //
T02D1852:140a-10: kha ni kun du sbyar bar bya //
T02D1852:140a-11: 'khyud dang kha ni sbyor ba dang //
T02D1852:140a-12: 'jib cing sid kyi sgra sgrogs pas //
T02D1852:140a-13: de ni lag ngar nang bzhag ste //
T02D1852:140a-14: rab tu gsal ba'i dga' ba bya //
T02D1852:140a-15: sna rtsa de bzhin mchan khung dang //
T02D1852:140a-16: mdun 'og ro smad la sogs par //
T02D1852:140a-17: sngags pas sen mos gdab bya zhing /
T02D1852:140a-18: yang nas yang du gdab par bya //
T02D1852:140a-19: g-yon pas padma mnye bya zhing //
T02D1852:140a-20: lag pa dag gis bu dkyil 'khor //
T02D1852:140a-21: g-yon pa'i rdo rje sor mo gsum //
T02D1852:140a-22: de nas padma rab gzhug bya //
T02D1852:140a-23: byang chub kyi ni sems 'byung rtsa //
T02D1852:140a-24: yi ge h'um las yang dag byung //
T02D1852:140a-26: / rdo rje lce yis bskul bar bya //
T02D1852:140a-27: de ltar byas par gyur pa na //
T02D1852:140a-28: gang tshe snying ni 'dar zhing myos //
T02D1852:140a-29: skra bshig lus ni gos dang bral //
T02D1852:140a-30: rdul gyi thig le 'dzag pas khyab //
T02D1852:140a-31: ldog par byed cing ba spu langs //
T02D1852:140a-32: mig ni kun du chags pas khyab //
T02D1852:140a-33: rang nyid mgul la 'khyud byed cing //
T02D1852:140a-34: sid kyi sgra ni rgyud 'byin pa //
T02D1852:140a-35: de tshe rig dang gnyis med pa'i //
T02D1852:140a-36: rnal 'byor pa ni skyil krung bcas //
T02D1852:140a-37: rdo rje 'chang gi nga rgyal 'dzin pa yis //
T02D1852:140a-38: byang sems bskyed phyir de nas ka li'i sgra //
T02D1852:140a-39: phat ces bya ba'i sgra ni rnam brtag cing //
T02D1852:140a-40: thabs dang shes rab rdo rje chu skyes byung //
T02D1852:140a-41: byang sems spros nas de yis yongs gang bya //
T02D1852:140a-42: rdo rje'i chus gang bum pa gang ba bzhin //
T02D1852:140a-43: sangs rgyas mtha' yas rdul snyed de ru gzhug //
T02D1852:140a-44: rig bcas til gang bzhin du nam mkha'i gang //
T02D1852:140a-45: chos 'byung 'od zer tshogs kyis bsdus nas ni //
T02D1852:140a-46: rab mchog bde ba dam pa phun tshogs gzhug /'dod chags me yis thub tshogs zhu gyur pa //
T02D1852:140a-47: pad gnas sangs rgyas mchog zhi bcud len te //
T02D1852:140a-48: de nyid khas blang bde ba chen po yis //
T02D1852:140a-49: rang gi lus bsgom 'khor lo kun tshim bya //
T02D1852:140a-50: 'di ni mkhas pas nang gi sbyin sreg bshad //
T02D1852:140a-51: de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das
T02D1852:140b-0: la mngon @140b par mchod pa'i phyir nyid kyi sku
T02D1852:140b-1: sangs rgyas spyan la sogs pa lha mo rnams kyi
T02D1852:140b-2: gzugs su mngon par sprul nas /
T02D1852:140b-3: gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa lha mo'i tshogs du mas yongs su bskor ba /
T02D1852:140b-4: rnam par bskyod cing sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i phyag yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa /
T02D1852:140b-5: 'od zer 'bar ba rnams kyis padma dang autpala dang
T02D1852:140b-6: sna ma dang dong ka dang ma li ka dang
T02D1852:140b-7: yu ti ka dang ka ra b'i ra la sogs
T02D1852:140b-8: pa'i me tog kha dog sna lnga pa dang /
T02D1852:140b-9: spos dang dri dang mar me dang /
T02D1852:140b-20: gos dang rin po che la sogs pa sna tshogs
T02D1852:140b-21: pa'i mchod pa'i sprin gyi dra ba'i tshogs sprul par
T02D1852:140b-22: byed pa / 'jig rten rnam sla sgyu ma la
T02D1852:140b-23: sogs pa'i dngos por shes pa'i sgo nas lta ba
T02D1852:140b-24: byed pa / la mkhas pa / bdag nyid ji
T02D1852:140b-25: lta ba bzhin du rtog pa ma lus pa rnams
T02D1852:140b-26: byed pa / la mkhas pa / las grol ba / bza' ba la sogs pa dang /
T02D1852:140b-27: myang ba dang gzhib pa dang /
T02D1852:140b-28: myos pa dang bcas pa dang /
T02D1852:140b-29: myos pa med pa'i btung ba la sogs pa dang /
T02D1852:140b-30: gar dang glu dag rol mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa bla na med pa sgrub par byed pa /
T02D1852:140b-31: dgod pa dang sgeg pa dang ldan pa'i rol cing
T02D1852:140b-32: dga' ba'i mchod pa bla na med pa dang bde
T02D1852:140b-33: ba skyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa de rnams kyis /
T02D1852:140b-34: mchog tu zag pa med pa'i bde ba chen po'i mchod pa bla na med pa rnams kyis /
T02D1852:140b-35: rang gi bdag po 'khor dang bcas pa la mchod
T02D1852:140b-36: par don yod grub pa'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas
T02D1852:140b-38: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dz'a badzra sv'a bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1852:140b-39: zhes bya ba 'dis mchod pa'i tshogs byin gyis brlab
T02D1852:140b-40: par bya'o zhes bya ba ni shin tu rnal 'byor
T02D1852:140b-41: ro // des ni rnal 'byor bzhi'i bdag nyid can
T02D1852:140b-42: gyi dang po sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge
T02D1852:140b-43: 'dzin rang gi don phun sum tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid
T02D1852:140b-44: ro // can bstan to // de nas lha mo'i
T02D1852:140b-45: tshogs de rnams rig ma'i padmar bcug la yang dag
T02D1852:140b-46: ro // can bstan to // par mchod de /
T02D1852:140b-47: byang chub sems kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam
T02D1852:140b-49: zla ba de la badzra dhrika ces bya ba'i sa bon rnam par bkod la /
T02D1852:140b-50: de gyur pa las yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs shing /
T02D1852:140b-51: rdo rje rtse lnga pas byin gyis brlabs pa /
T02D1852:141a-2: badzra dhrik ces bya ba brjod cing phyung nas /
T02D1852:141a-3: des zhe sdang gi spyod pa can rnams btul te /
T02D1852:141a-4: bkug ste rang gi lus la bkug ste /
T02D1852:141a-5: rang gi ngo bor yongs su gyur nas zhe sdang rdo rjer gyur par bya ste /
T02D1852:141a-7: rnam brtsegs gtum zhing 'jigs su rung //
T02D1852:141a-8: rdo rje sems dpa' dbang bskur zhing //
T02D1852:141a-9: 'jig rten khams ni kun du khyab //
T02D1852:141a-10: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas shing //
T02D1852:141a-11: nyi ma stong gi 'od dang mtshungs //
T02D1852:141a-12: spyan dmar shin tu 'jigs par byed //
T02D1852:141a-13: rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste /
T02D1852:141a-14: drag po zhi ba chags chen gyi //
T02D1852:141a-15: zhal gsum gyis ni rnam par mdzes //
T02D1852:141a-16: rang gi dam tshig snyoms zhugs shing //
T02D1852:141a-17: phyag drug gis ni brgyan pa ste //
T02D1852:141a-19: sangs rgyas sprin gyis kun du khyab //
T02D1852:141a-20: rdo rje chen po rtse dgu pa //
T02D1852:141a-21: de yi phyag tu rnam bsgom zhing //
T02D1852:141a-22: sngar bshad pa yi rim pa bzhin //
T02D1852:141a-23: phyag rgya lhag ma rnam bsgom bya //
T02D1852:141a-24: zhe sdang rdo rje'i ting 'dzin gnas //
T02D1852:141a-25: dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu dbyung //
T02D1852:141a-26: de ltar rang snying las byung zhing //
T02D1852:141a-27: yi ge gsum gyis brlabs pa yi //
T02D1852:141a-28: lha rnams thams cad pad zla las //
T02D1852:141a-29: de rnams nyid kyis spro bar bya //
T02D1852:141a-30: 'dzi na dzik sngags las byung ba'i //
T02D1852:141a-31: khyab bdag rnam par snang mdzad spro //
T02D1852:141a-32: zhi ba'i ro yis kun du khyab //
T02D1852:141a-33: phyogs rnams thams cad snang bar byed //
T02D1852:141a-34: sku ni ston ka'i sprin dang mtshungs //
T02D1852:141a-35: rgyan rnams sna tshogs dag gis brgyan //
T02D1852:141a-36: de yi zhal gsum kha dog ni //
T02D1852:141a-37: dkar dang sngo dang shin tu dmar //
T02D1852:141a-38: sna tshogs 'od zer bkod chen ldan ;
T02D1852:141a-39: / de ni phyag drug ldan par bsgom //
T02D1852:141a-40: 'khor lo rdo rje chu skyes dkar //
T02D1852:141a-41: g-yas pa dag tu rnam par bsam //
T02D1852:141a-42: dril bu nor bu ral gri ni //
T02D1852:141a-43: g-yon pa dag tu rnam par bsam //
T02D1852:141a-44: padma zla ba las byung ste //
T02D1852:141a-45: phyogs rnams kun du rnam gzigs shing //
T02D1852:141a-47: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yis //
T02D1852:141a-48: gti mug lam la rab gnas pa'i //
T02D1852:141a-49: sems can thams cad yang dag sbyangs //
T02D1852:141a-50: slar byon nas ni mgon po yi //
T02D1852:141a-51: shar du zla ba la bzhugs so //
T02D1852:141a-52: ratna dhrik ces bya ba 'dis snga ma bzhin du rin chen 'byung ldan ser po /
T02D1852:141b-0: rtsa ba'i zhal sku dang mtshungs shing @141b zhal g-yas
T02D1852:141b-1: pa dang g-yon pa sngon po dang dkar po mnga'
T02D1852:141b-2: ba / rtsa ba'i phyag na nyi ma ltar dmar ba'i rin po che dang /
T02D1852:141b-3: gzhan dag na rdo rje dang 'khor lo bsnams shing //
T02D1852:141b-4: g-yon pa rnams na dril bu dang padma dang ral gri bsnams pa phyung ste /
T02D1852:141b-5: mngon pa'i nga rgyal can gyi sems can rnams btul nas log ste /
T02D1852:141b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyi lho phyogs su rin po che zur brgyad pa la bzhugs so //
T02D1852:141b-7: a'a ro lik ces bya ba 'dis 'od dpag tu med pa /
T02D1852:141b-8: g-yas pa dang g-yon pa kha dog sngon po dang dkar po /
T02D1852:141b-9: g-yon pa na sgeg pa dang bcas pas dril bu
T02D1852:141b-10: dang bcas pa'i padma dmar po'i sdong bu bsnams shing
T02D1852:141b-11: / g-yas pas thugs ka na gnas pa'i padma kha 'byed par mdzad pa /
T02D1852:141b-12: g-yas pa dag na rdo rje dang 'khor lo //
T02D1852:141b-13: g-yon pa dag na rin po che dang ral gri bsnams pa /
T02D1852:141b-14: 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can rnams btul nas /
T02D1852:141b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyi nub phyogs su padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa'i gdan la bzhugs so //
T02D1852:141b-16: pradzny'a dhrik ces bya ba las byung ba'i don yod
T02D1852:141b-17: par grub pa beed'urya ljang ser lta bu rgyan thams
T02D1852:141b-19: zhal g-yas pa dang g-yon pa sngon po dang dkar po mnga' ba /
T02D1852:141b-20: 'od zer kha dog sna lnga pas kun du khyab pa /
T02D1852:141b-21: phyag drug pa g-yas pa'i rtsa ba'i phyag na ral gri dang gnyis na 'khor lo dang /
T02D1852:141b-22: sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams shing /
T02D1852:141b-23: g-yon pa dag ni dril bu dang rin po che dang padma ljang ser bsnams pa phyung ste /
T02D1852:141b-24: phrag dog gi spyod pa can gyi sems can rnams yang dag par sbyangs nas /
T02D1852:141b-25: log ste byang phyogs su 'od zer gyi gdan la
T02D1852:141b-26: bcom ldan 'das la gzigs shing bzhugs par bsam par
T02D1852:141b-27: bya'o // de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni ral pa'i
T02D1852:141b-28: cod pan dang ldan zhing rdo rje 'chang chen po'i
T02D1852:141b-29: dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1852:141b-30: dve sha ra ti zhes bya ba 'dis m'i ma k'i autpala sngon po'i mdog can /
T02D1852:141b-31: zhal mdzes pa dang ldan zhing spyan yangs pa mnga' ba /
T02D1852:141b-32: gzugs dang lang tshos brgyan pa zhal dbus ma sku dang mtshungs shing /
T02D1852:141b-33: zhal g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dkar po dang dmar po mnga' ba /
T02D1852:141b-34: me tog sna tshogs kyis bcings pa'i thor tshugs can mi bskyod pa'i dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa /
T02D1852:141b-35: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D1852:142a-0: @142a * // phyag g-yas pa na rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang autpala rtsa dmar ba /
T02D1852:142a-1: g-yon pa na sgeg pa dang bcas pas dril bu
T02D1852:142a-2: dang rin po che dang ral gri bsnams pa phyung
T02D1852:142a-3: ste / des bgegs chen po rnams kyi 'jigs pas
T02D1852:142a-4: nyen pa rnams kun du bsrungs nas bkug ste bden
T02D1852:142a-5: bral gyi phyogs su padma dang nyi ma la bzhugs
T02D1852:142a-6: shing mgon po la gzigs par blta bar bya'o //
T02D1852:142a-7: de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings rdo rje ma la
T02D1852:142a-8: thug pa'i lha mo rnams ni me tog sna tshogs
T02D1852:142a-9: kyis bcings pa'i thor tshugs dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1852:142a-10: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ral pa'i cod pan dang ldan pa /
T02D1852:142a-11: dkyil 'khor ba thams cad rtsa ba'i zhal sku dang
T02D1852:142a-12: mtshungs shing rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi
T02D1852:142a-13: dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1852:142a-14: mo ha ra ti zhes bya ba 'dis sangs rgyas
T02D1852:142a-15: spyan zhal gsum pa ston ka'i zla ba lta bu
T02D1852:142a-16: zhi ba'i ro dang ldan pa /
T02D1852:142a-17: zhal g-yas pa dang g-yon pa sngon po dang dmar po mnga' ba /
T02D1852:142a-18: 'od zer dkar pos khyab pa'i 'od dang ldan pa /
T02D1852:142a-19: rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan zhing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D1852:142a-20: g-yas pa rnams kyis 'khor lo rdo rje dang autpala dkar po dang /
T02D1852:142a-21: g-yon pa rnams kyis dril bu dang rin po che
T02D1852:142a-22: dang ral gri bsnams pa des gdon la sogs pa
T02D1852:142a-23: rnams kyis nyen pa rnams zhi bar byas te /
T02D1852:142a-24: de slar bkug nas me'i phyogs su zla ba la bzhugs so //
T02D1852:142a-25: r'a ga ra ti zhes bya ba 'dis gos dkar mo padma r'a ga dang /
T02D1852:142a-27: zhal g-yas pa dang g-yon pa sngo ba dang dkar po mnga' ba /
T02D1852:142a-28: mtshan thams cad yongs su rdzogs shing /
T02D1852:142a-29: rgyan thams cad kyis mdzes pa /
T02D1852:142a-30: g-yon pa na sgeg pa dang bcas pas sdong bu'i khri shing dang bcas pa'i dril bu bsnams shing /
T02D1852:142a-31: g-yas pas autpala dmar po kha 'byed pa /
T02D1852:142a-32: g-yas dag na rdo rje dang 'khor lo /
T02D1852:142a-33: g-yon pa dag na nor bu dang ral gri bsnams
T02D1852:142a-34: pa des gdon la sogs pas bskams pa rnams rgyas
T02D1852:142a-35: par bya ste / rlung gi phyogs su padma'i steng gi 'dab ma la bzhugs so //
T02D1852:142a-36: badzra ra ti'i sa bon las sgrol ma margad ltar ljang ser du snang ba /
T02D1852:142a-37: yan lag thams cad mtshan dang ldan zhing bud med
T02D1852:142a-38: kyis bsgrub par bya ba'i 'dod pa la brtson pa
T02D1852:142b-0: / @142b sgeg cing 'dzum la zur mig dang ldan
T02D1852:142b-1: pa'i zhal mnga' ba zhal g-yas pa dang g-yon pa
T02D1852:142b-2: sngon po dang dkar po mnga' ba /
T02D1852:142b-3: g-yas pa rnams kyis ral gri dang sna tshogs rdo rje dang 'khor lo //
T02D1852:142b-4: g-yon pa rnams kyis dril bu dang rin po che dang autpala ljang ser bsnams pa phyung ste /
T02D1852:142b-5: chags shing sdang la rmongs par gyur pa rnams 'od
T02D1852:142b-6: zer rnams kyis reg pas dbang du byas nas log
T02D1852:142b-7: ste dbang ldan gyi mtshams su 'od zer gyi dkyil
T02D1852:142b-8: 'khor la bzhugs te mgon po la gzigs par bsam
T02D1852:142b-9: par bya'o // yi ge thlim las sa'i snying po
T02D1852:142b-10: sku mdog dang zhal la sogs pa rnam par snang
T02D1852:142b-12: yi ge aom tshad gsum pa'i sa bon las byams
T02D1852:142b-13: pa phyag g-yas pa na n'a ga ge sar gyi
T02D1852:142b-15: lhag ma snga ma dang mtshungs pa'o //
T02D1852:142b-16: yi ge aom gsum las go rims bzhin du rdo
T02D1852:142b-17: rje dang rin po che dang padma la gnas pa'i
T02D1852:142b-18: phyag na rdo rje dang nam mkha'i snying po dang
T02D1852:142b-19: 'jig rten dbang phyug mi bskyod pa dang rin chen
T02D1852:142b-20: 'byung ldan dang 'od dpag tu med pa dang mtshungs
T02D1852:142b-21: pa'o // yi ge ham las byung ba'i 'phags pa
T02D1852:142b-22: 'jam dpal g-yas pa'i rtsa ba'i phyag gis ral gri
T02D1852:142b-23: pa'o // 'chang zhing / g-yon pas thugs ka'i phyogs su dril bu bsnams pa'o //
T02D1852:142b-24: h'a zhes bya ba 'di las sgrib pa thams cad
T02D1852:142b-25: rnam par sel ba phyag g-yon pa rol pa'i tshul
T02D1852:142b-27: g-yas pa na me tog gi phyag rgyas rdo rje autpala bsnams pa /
T02D1852:142b-28: lhag ma don yod pa dang mtshungs pa /
T02D1852:142b-29: yi ge aom las kun du bzang po de dang mtshungs pa'o //
T02D1852:142b-30: de nas aom sv'a a'a: h'a h'um aa zhes bya
T02D1852:142b-31: ba de rnams las gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs
T02D1852:142b-32: pa rnams dang / byams pa dang 'jam dpal gyi
T02D1852:142b-33: sa bon dag las byams pa dang snying rje ma
T02D1852:142b-34: sa bon gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs pa rnams phyung
T02D1852:142b-35: pa rnams dang / ste / de rnams kyis rnam
T02D1852:142b-36: pa gsum pa'i gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams dang
T02D1852:142b-37: pa rnams dang / ste / / byams pa dang
T02D1852:142b-38: snying rje dag rnam par sbyangs nas bkug ste dbang
T02D1852:142b-39: ldan gyi phyogs dang nye ba nas brtsams nas /
T02D1852:142b-40: shar du su'i snying po dang gzugs rdo rje ma
T02D1852:142b-41: byams pa dang lha mo byams ma dgod par bya'o
T02D1852:142b-42: // de bzhin du lho ru phyag na rdo rje dang sgra rdo rje ma /
T02D1852:142b-43: nam mkha'i snying po dang dri rdo rje ma'o //
T02D1852:143a-1: 'jig rten dbang phyug dang ro rdo rje ma /
T02D1852:143a-2: 'jam dpal dang lha mo snying rje ma'o //
T02D1852:143a-3: byang du ni sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang reg bya rdo rje ma /
T02D1852:143a-4: kun du bzang po dang chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo
T02D1852:143a-5: rje ma ste rang gi phyogs dang rjes su mthun
T02D1852:143a-6: pa'i gdan la bzhugs pa dang /
T02D1852:143a-7: rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi kha dog dang ldan pa rnams bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1852:143a-8: khyad par rnams ni brjod par bya ste /
T02D1852:143a-9: gzugs rdo rje ma ni phyag gnyis kyis me long 'dzin pa'i bya ba dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1852:143a-10: de bzhin du thams cad kyang n'a ga ge sar gyi lcug ma dang /
T02D1852:143a-11: pi wang brdung ba dang dri'i dung phor dang /
T02D1852:143a-12: ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i snod dang /
T02D1852:143a-13: ral gri dang dril bu dang mtha' gnyis su rdo
T02D1852:143a-14: rjes mtshan pa'i ka tsa lin di'i gos reg bya
T02D1852:143a-15: bde ba dang ldan pa dang /
T02D1852:143a-16: sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i gru gsum dkar po
T02D1852:143a-17: chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rnams phyag gnyis na bsnams
T02D1852:143a-18: pa'o // ya m'anta kri ta ces bya ba 'dis
T02D1852:143a-19: 'phags pa gshin rje mthar byed 'jig pa'i dus kyi
T02D1852:143a-20: sprin gyi tshogs dang mtshungs pa /
T02D1852:143a-21: zhal g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dkar po dang dmar po mnga' ba /
T02D1852:143a-22: 'od zer 'bar ba'i tshogs rnams kyis nam mkha'i dbyings ma lus pa khyab pa /
T02D1852:143a-23: g-yas pa rnams na 'khor lo dang ral gri dang tho ba bsnams pa /
T02D1852:143a-24: g-yon pa dril bu dang bcas pas snyoms par zhugs pa'i ro langs ma'i nu ma 'dzin cing /
T02D1852:143a-25: gzhan dag gis sgra sta dang zhags pa'o //
T02D1852:143a-26: pradzny'anta kri ta ces bya bas gzhan gyis mi thub
T02D1852:143a-27: pa dkar po zhal g-yas dang g-yon sngon po dang
T02D1852:143a-29: g-yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang dbyug pa bskor ba dang ral gri 'phyar ba'o //
T02D1852:143a-30: g-yon na dril bu dang bcas pas gzhan gyis mi thub ma'i nu ma 'dzin cing /
T02D1852:143a-31: gzhan dag gis dgra sta dang sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1852:143a-32: padm'anta kri ta ces bya bas rta mgrin me tog bandu ka lta bu /
T02D1852:143a-33: zhal g-yas dang g-yon sngon po dang dkar po mnga' ba /
T02D1852:143a-34: gad rgyangs kyis ri bo'i tshogs 'jig par mdzad pa /
T02D1852:143a-35: g-yas pa rnams kyis padma bskyod pa dang ral gri dang tho ba bsnams pa /
T02D1852:143a-36: g-yon pas de bzhin du khro gnyer can gyi nu
T02D1852:143a-37: ma dang gzhan dag gis dgra sta dang zhags pa
T02D1852:143b-0: 'dzin pa'o // bighn'anta kri ta ces bya @143b bas
T02D1852:143b-1: 'phags pa bdud rtsi 'khyil ba bgegs kyi rigs ma
T02D1852:143b-2: lus pa skrag par mdzad pa zar ma'i me tog
T02D1852:143b-3: 'dzin pa'o // lta bu / zhal g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dkar po dang dmar po mnga' ba /
T02D1852:143b-4: g-yas pa rnams kyis sna tshogs rdo rje bskyod pa dang ral gri dang tho ba bsnams pa /
T02D1852:143b-5: g-yon pas ral ba gcig ma'i nu ma /
T02D1852:143b-6: gzhan dag gis dgra sta dang zhags pa 'dzin pa ste /
T02D1852:143b-7: yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs pa de rnams
T02D1852:143b-8: ya m'anta krita ces bya ba la sogs pa brjod
T02D1852:143b-9: pas rim pa bzhin du phyung ste /
T02D1852:143b-10: sems can thams cad kyi rgyud la yod pa'i 'chi
T02D1852:143b-11: bdag dang nyon mongs pa dang phung po dang lha'i
T02D1852:143b-12: bu'i bdud kyi rnam par rtog pa rnams bsal nas
T02D1852:143b-13: log ste shar dang lho dang nub dang byang gi
T02D1852:143b-14: sgo rnams su rang gi padma dang nyi ma'i gdan
T02D1852:143b-15: rnams la gshin rje dang khyab 'jug dang tshangs pa
T02D1852:143b-16: dang bgegs kyi bdag po dang lus ngan po dang
T02D1852:143b-17: 'dod pa'i lha la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can de
T02D1852:143b-18: rnams nyid go rims bzhin du g-yas brkyang pa dang
T02D1852:143b-19: sa ga dang zlum po'i 'dug stangs rnams kyis mnan
T02D1852:143b-20: nas bzhugs par bsam par bya'o //
T02D1852:143b-21: khro bo 'dod pa aindra n'i la'i mdog dang ldan zhing khro ba dang bcas pa /
T02D1852:143b-22: zhal g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dkar po dang dmar po mnga' ba dang /
T02D1852:143b-23: sgeg pa'i cha byad can phyag bzhi pa /
T02D1852:143b-24: rtsa ba'i phyag dag na 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i phyag
T02D1852:143b-25: rgyas rdo rje lcags kyu dang zhags pa bsnams shing
T02D1852:143b-26: gzhan dag gis mda' dang gzhu bsnams pa /
T02D1852:143b-27: rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan zhing rgyan thams
T02D1852:143b-28: cad kyis brgyan pa nyi ma lta bu'i 'od mnga'
T02D1852:143b-29: ba / me'i mtshams su padma dang nyi ma'i gdan
T02D1852:143b-30: la g-yon brkyang bas me lha mnan nas bzhugs par
T02D1852:143b-31: ba / bsam par bya'o // dbyug pa sngon po
T02D1852:143b-32: sku mdog la sogs pa rnams bdud rtsi 'khyil pa
T02D1852:143b-33: ba / bsam par bya'o // dang mtshungs pa /
T02D1852:143b-34: phyag g-yas pa rnams kyis dbyug pa sngon po bskyod
T02D1852:143b-35: pa dang 'khor lo dang padma bsnams pa /
T02D1852:143b-36: g-yon pa dril bu dang bcas pas snyoms par zhugs shing 'khyud pa'i rig ma'i nu ma 'dzin cing /
T02D1852:143b-37: gzhan dag gis rin po che dang ral gri bsnams pa /
T02D1852:143b-38: bden bral gyi mtshams su g-yon brkyang ba'i 'dug stangs kyis bden bral mnan nas bzhugs so //
T02D1852:144a-0: 'phags pa stobs po che 'phags pa dbyug pa sngon po dang mtshungs @144a * //
T02D1852:144a-2: 'on kyang phyag g-yas pa dag gis 'od zer dkar
T02D1852:144a-3: po dang ldan pa'i rdo rje dang 'khor lo bsnams
T02D1852:144a-4: pa / rlung gi mtshams su rlung lha dang chu lha dag mnan nas bzhugs so //
T02D1852:144a-5: 'phags pa mi g-yo ba sku mdog la sogs pa rnams mi bskyod pa'i rnam pa can te /
T02D1852:144a-6: 'on kyang g-yas pa'i rtsa ba'i phyag gis rdo rje ral gri bskyod cing /
T02D1852:144a-7: gzhan phyag g-yon pa dril bu dang zhags pa dang bcas pas rig ma'i nu ma 'dzin pa /
T02D1852:144a-9: dbang ldan gyi mtshams su g-yon brkyang bas dbang phyug chen po mnan nas bzhugs pa'o //
T02D1852:144a-10: yi ge bhr'um las byung ba'i gtsug tor 'khor los
T02D1852:144a-11: sgyur ba chen po rig ma dang bcas shing sku
T02D1852:144a-12: mdog ser po rtsa ba'i zhal sku dang mtshungs shing
T02D1852:144a-13: / zhal g-yas pa dang g-yon pa sngon po dang ser po mnga' ba /
T02D1852:144a-14: phyag la sogs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang mtshungs pa ste /
T02D1852:144a-15: 'on kyang mdun du rtsa ba'i phyag gis gtsug tor bsnams shing /
T02D1852:144a-16: rdo rje dang padma dang 'khor lo dang phreng ba dang ldan pa /
T02D1852:144a-17: 'og tu padma dang nyi ma'i gdan la g-yon brkyang
T02D1852:144a-18: bas thags bzangs ris dang klu rnams dang sa'i lha
T02D1852:144a-20: dpal gnod mdzes rgyal po ni snga ma dang mtshungs pa ste /
T02D1852:144a-21: 'on kyang steng na tshangs pa dang nyi ma dang
T02D1852:144a-22: zla ba la sogs pa rnams mnan nas bzhugs par
T02D1852:144a-25: 'dod dbyig stobs chen mi g-yo ba //
T02D1852:144a-26: lcags kyu dbyug pa rtse gsum dang //
T02D1852:144a-27: ral gri mtshams rnams dag tu dgod //
T02D1852:144a-30: khro bo de rnams thams cad kyang smin ma bteg cing khro gnyer dang bcas pa /
T02D1852:144a-31: 'jig pa'i dus kyi me dang nyi ma dang mtshungs
T02D1852:144a-32: pa'i spyan zlum po g-yo zhing 'jigs su rung ba
T02D1852:144a-33: / dbu skra ser po gyen du brdzes pa /
T02D1852:144a-34: bung ba ltar sngo ba'i klu mtha' yas dang rigs
T02D1852:144a-35: ldan dag gis bcings pa'i thod pa'i phreng ba dang
T02D1852:144a-36: ldan pa'i cod pan mnga' ba /
T02D1852:144a-37: sma ra 'bar bas shin tu gsal zhing mche ba
T02D1852:144a-38: gtsigs la khro ba dang bcas shing bzhad pa'i zhal
T02D1852:144a-39: mnga' ba / gsus pa 'phyang zhing brang rgya che ba dang ldan pa /
T02D1852:144b-0: gser dang mtshungs pa'i 'jog po @144b sgeg pa dang bcas pas rna rgyan byas pa /
T02D1852:144b-1: gser btso ma dang mtshungs pa'i klu padma chen po zhes bya bas brgyan pa /
T02D1852:144b-2: padma'i skud pa ltar dkar ba'i stobs rgyu'i tshangs pa'i skud pa thogs pa /
T02D1852:144b-3: padma dmar po lta bu'i nor rgyas kyi bus rnam par spras pa'i ska rags bzang po mnga' ba /
T02D1852:144b-4: klu padma dang dung skyong dkar po dang dmar pos rkang gdub byas pa /
T02D1852:144b-5: seng ge'i pags pa rlon pa bsnams shing /
T02D1852:144b-6: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs dang ldan par bsam par bya'o //
T02D1852:144b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis rang gi rig ma dang bcas pa'o //
T02D1852:144b-8: lha mo rnams ni bdag po rnams dang ngo //
T02D1852:144b-9: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rang gi rig ma rnams dang ngo //
T02D1852:144b-10: de kho na bzhin du khro bo rnams ni g-yas
T02D1852:144b-11: brkyang ba la sogs pa'i 'dug stangs kyis bcas pa'o
T02D1852:144b-12: // de ltar sku dang gsung dang thugs dang shes rab dang bcas pa ste /
T02D1852:144b-13: phyag rgya bzhis lha'i 'khor lo rgyas btab par blta bar byas te /
T02D1852:144b-14: sku ni phyag rgya chen po ste //
T02D1852:144b-15: gsung gi chos kyi phyag rgya yin //
T02D1852:144b-16: thugs ni las kyi phyag rgya ste //
T02D1852:144b-17: shes rab dam tshig phyag rgyar bshad //
T02D1852:144b-19: de nas rang gi ye shes kyi 'od zer gyi
T02D1852:144b-20: lcags kyu rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs
T02D1852:144b-21: pa rnams bsdus nas chu'i rlabs bzhin du dkyil 'khor
T02D1852:144b-23: de rnams dang lhan cig tha mi dad par lha'i 'khor lo bsam par bya'o //
T02D1852:144b-24: de nas dkyil 'khor las phyi rol du gser gyi mdog can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D1852:144b-25: padma'i steng na 'dug cing bde ba'i yo byad thams
T02D1852:144b-26: cad thogs pa'i bud med rin po che dang de
T02D1852:144b-27: bzhin du gnod sbyin gyi cha byad can gyi khyim
T02D1852:144b-29: mche ba drug dang ldan zhing dkar ba'i glang po rin po che dang /
T02D1852:144b-30: mtho zhing ser ba'i rta rin po che dang /
T02D1852:144b-31: rin po che du mas spras pa'i chang zungs dang
T02D1852:144b-32: ldan zhing autpa la sngon po'i 'dab ma lta bu'i
T02D1852:144b-33: ral gri rin po che dang /
T02D1852:144b-34: 'od zer 'phro zhing rtsibs brgyad dang ldan pa'i 'khor lo rin po che dang /
T02D1852:144b-35: 'od zer dpag tu med pas nam mkha'i dbyings ma
T02D1852:144b-36: lus pa gsal bar byed pa'i dmag dpon rin po
T02D1852:144b-37: che dang / rdo rje'i lha'i bo mo dang /
T02D1852:144b-38: rdo rje'i lha'i bu mo dang /
T02D1852:145a-1: pa la sogs pa'i tshogs rab tu dga' ba dang
T02D1852:145a-2: ldan pa rnams kyis byas pa'i glu dang gar dang
T02D1852:145a-3: pi wang dang gling bu dang rdza rnga dang khar
T02D1852:145a-4: dkrol la sogs pa'i cha co'i sgras nam mkha'i dbyings
T02D1852:145a-5: ma lus pa kun du gang zhing 'khrugs pa dang
T02D1852:145a-6: / gser gyi mdog can gyi autpala dang padma dkar
T02D1852:145a-7: po la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams
T02D1852:145a-8: / kyis brgyan pa / ngang pa dang dur pa
T02D1852:145a-9: la sogs pa'i tshogs yid du 'ong zhing sgra snyan
T02D1852:145a-10: pa sgrogs pa rnams dang ldan pas yid du 'ong
T02D1852:145a-11: / kyis brgyan pa / ba / me tog dang
T02D1852:145a-12: shing mchog rnam pa tha dad pa rnams kyis brgyan
T02D1852:145a-13: / kyis brgyan pa / ba / pa / rin
T02D1852:145a-14: po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi skas dang ldan
T02D1852:145a-16: dpag bsam gyi shing rnams dang /
T02D1852:145a-17: phyogs bzhi ru 'khor lo mchod pa'i phyir dri dang
T02D1852:145a-18: spos dang mar me dang me tog dang bza' ba
T02D1852:145a-19: dang bca' ba dang khang bzangs dkar po bla na
T02D1852:145a-20: med pa dang / skyed mos tshal dang bzhon pa dang /
T02D1852:145a-21: mal stan dang gdan la sogs pa dpag tu med pa /
T02D1852:145a-22: yi ge sv'a'i sa bon las byung ba /
T02D1852:145a-23: chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa bsam par bya'o //
T02D1852:145a-25: rang bzhin dag pa'i chos rnams kyi //
T02D1852:145a-26: chos dbyings gnas pa med pa la //
T02D1852:145a-27: rtog pa'i rdo rje las byung ba //
T02D1852:145a-28: rjod pa yang ni brjod pa min //
T02D1852:145a-29: zhes bya ba 'dis stong pa nyid du ro gcig cing /
T02D1852:145a-30: brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i dngos po thams cad kyi
T02D1852:145a-31: bdag nyid dkyil 'khor ba'i lha rnams dang tha dad
T02D1852:145a-32: pa med cing rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i mchog
T02D1852:145a-33: tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin du bdag nyid bsgom par
T02D1852:145a-34: bya'o zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog
T02D1852:145a-35: ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa'o //
T02D1852:145a-36: las rgyal po mchog ni de nyid du zhe sdang
T02D1852:145a-37: la sogs pa rnams la mngon par dga' ba'i sems
T02D1852:145a-38: can gyi don bya ba'i mtshan nyid du khong du
T02D1852:145a-39: chud par bya'o // de nas brtan par bya ba'i phyir phra mo'i rnal 'byor bsgom par bya ste /
T02D1852:145a-40: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rnal 'byor pas ni rang
T02D1852:145a-41: gi rig ma'i padma'i sna rtse rin po che kha
T02D1852:145a-42: dog sna lnga ba yungs kar gyi 'bru'i tshad tsam
T02D1852:145a-43: bsams la / de'i nang du brtan pa dang g-yo
T02D1852:145a-44: ba'i dngos po thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi rang
T02D1852:145a-45: gi 'khor lo bdag po dang bcas pa'am /
T02D1852:145b-0: lha mo bzhis yongs su bskor ba'i gsang ba lnga'i bdag nyid @145b blta bar bya'o //
T02D1852:145b-1: yang na phung po sogs pa byin gyis brlabs pas
T02D1852:145b-2: snyoms par zhugs shing las la gnas pa'i gzugs gcig
T02D1852:145b-3: pu / ji srid sgra la sogs pa nye bar
T02D1852:145b-4: gyur pa mi dmigs pa dang bsam par bya ba
T02D1852:145b-5: tsam la dmigs pa'i mtshan ma'i sgo nas sems brtan
T02D1852:145b-6: par gyur par sems kyis shes par gyur pa de
T02D1852:145b-10: rab mchog sprin rnams spro bar bya //
T02D1852:145b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dkyil 'khor pa
T02D1852:145b-18: rnams kyis nam mkha'i dbyings ma lus pa til gyi
T02D1852:145b-19: gang bu bzhin du kun du bkang ste /
T02D1852:145b-23: rjes su mnyes par yang bya'o ;
T02D1852:145b-24: / de bzhin du zhe sdang rdo rje rnal 'byor
T02D1852:145b-25: pas ni autpala sngon po'i 'dab ma lta bu'i rdo
T02D1852:145b-26: rje rtse dgu pa 'bar ba nas kyi 'bru'i tshad
T02D1852:145b-27: tsam dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mi bskyod
T02D1852:145b-28: pa'i rnal 'byor bas ni rdo rje rtse lnga pa
T02D1852:145b-29: 'bar ba dang / rang gi rigs kyi de bzhin
T02D1852:145b-30: gshegs pa'i rnal 'byor bas ni tsa na ka'i 'bras
T02D1852:145b-31: bu'i tshad tsam gyi 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa dang
T02D1852:145b-32: 'bar ba dang / / de bzhin padma rigs kyi
T02D1852:145b-33: rnal 'byor pas padma 'dab ma brgyad pa dang rin
T02D1852:145b-34: po che'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor bas snga ma bzhin
T02D1852:145b-37: rang gi rigs kyi don yod par grub pa'i rnal
T02D1852:145b-38: 'byor bas autpala ljang gu'i 'dab ma lta bu'i ral
T02D1852:145b-39: gri nas kyi 'bru'i tshad tsam bsams la /
T02D1852:145b-40: thams cad kyi cho ga kun rdo rje 'chang chen po dang mtshungs par bya'o //
T02D1852:145b-41: de ltar mtshan ma dang lha'i rjes su gnang ba thob pa /
T02D1852:145b-42: sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor du thams cad byed cing grub
T02D1852:145b-43: pa ni 'gro ba ma lus pa rnams kyi bsam
T02D1852:145b-44: pa yongs su rdzogs par byed nus par 'gyur ro
T02D1852:145b-46: rang gi snying ga'i ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i
T02D1852:145b-47: padma dang zla ba la bhr'um aom a'a: h'um badzra
T02D1852:145b-48: dhrik sv'a h'a / zhes bya ba'i sngags kyi phreng ba mgo gyen du bltas shing /
T02D1852:146a-1: gnas pa'i mar me bzhin du lus kyi yan lag kun du gsal bar byed pa bkod la /
T02D1852:146a-2: mar me las mar me 'byung ba bzhin du ye shes sems dpa'i rdo rje nas phyung ste /
T02D1852:146a-3: rang gi rig ma'i kha nas ye shes kyi rig ma'i zhal du bcug la /
T02D1852:146a-4: de bzhin du rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gyi 'khor lo bcug nas /
T02D1852:146a-5: de'i padma'i lam dang rig ma'i padma'i lam nas phyung ste /
T02D1852:146a-6: rang gi rdo rje'i lam dang ye shes sems dpa' de'i lam nas bcug la /
T02D1852:146a-7: dkyil 'khor de'i thugs ka'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gzhug cing bzlas par bya ste /
T02D1852:146a-8: yang dang yang du sngags brjod cing /
T02D1852:146a-9: til gyi gang bu dang mtshungs pa'i dkyil 'khor pa rnams la yang de bzhin du sngags bkod de /
T02D1852:146a-10: thams cad kyi sngags kyi sgra la de rnams kyi sgo nas dmigs shing bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D1852:146a-11: de bzhin du lha thams cad kyi rnal 'byor pa
T02D1852:146a-12: bdag nyid kyis rang gi sngags dgod pa sngon du
T02D1852:146a-13: 'gro ba can ni rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa'o
T02D1852:146a-14: // de la lha thams cad kyi sngags kyi ni
T02D1852:146a-15: bhr'um aom a'a:h'um zhes bya ba bkod nas 'byin pa'i
T02D1852:146a-16: snying po sv'a h'a'i mtha' can rnams yin no zhes
T02D1852:146a-17: bya ba ni man ngag yin no //
T02D1852:146a-18: mgo dang lkog ma dang snying ga'i phyogs rnams su
T02D1852:146a-19: rten dang bcas pa'i sku la sogs pa'i yi ge
T02D1852:146a-21: sngags de rnams las phyag mtshan dang lha rnams rigs
T02D1852:146a-22: kyi bye brag gi sgo nas rnam pa gsum rim
T02D1852:146a-23: gyis sam cig car du spro bar bya ste /
T02D1852:146a-24: 'dis ni rdo rje gsum dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro //
T02D1852:146a-25: til gyi gang bu dang mtshungs pa'i dkyil 'khor pa rnams la sku gsung thugs bsams te /
T02D1852:146a-26: lha mo'i tshogs yang dag par spros la snga ma
T02D1852:146a-27: bzhin du bla na med pa la sogs pa'i mchod
T02D1852:146a-28: pa bya ste / 'bras bu de ni de dang mtshungs pa'o //
T02D1852:146a-29: yang na dkyil 'khor na gnas pa'i sku rdo rje'i
T02D1852:146a-30: rnal 'byor pas sgyu ma lta bu'i sku la sogs
T02D1852:146a-31: par lhag par mos pa'i sgo nas ye shes sems
T02D1852:146a-32: dpa'i thugs kar padma'i zla ba la yi ge aom
T02D1852:146a-34: yi ge aom las 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang rnam par snang mdzad rnams spro bar bya'o //
T02D1852:146a-35: de bzhin du gsung rdo rje la sogs pa lha
T02D1852:146b-0: thams cad kyi rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis @146b kyang
T02D1852:146b-2: thams cad du sngags brjod par bya zhing /
T02D1852:146b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa thams cad yang dag par spros te /
T02D1852:146b-4: de rnams kyis nam mkha' la brjod pa'i mthar de rnams yang dag par bsdus te /
T02D1852:146b-5: rang gi snying gar gzhug cing bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D1852:146b-7: sgra'am sgra ma yin pa dang /
